name: OWL (Fearone)
description: OWL was originally my school project, thanks to it, I passed the project and raised the whole school on my ears, then I came up with the idea to make a full-fledged project. In early May, a demo version of the game called OWL: indie-game DEMO was released, and on July 12, I finally released the game I hope the game will hurt you with something, good luck!
